tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE food_traceability_system (
   product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   product_name STRING,
   supplier_id INT,
   supplier_name STRING,
   production_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Food_Products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    production_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Traceability_Logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    action_type VARCHAR(50),
    action_date TIMESTAMP,
    worker_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE traceability_system (
	product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	production_date DATE,
	supplier_name VARCHAR(100),
	location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE traceability_inspections (
	inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	product_id INT,
	inspection_date DATE,
	inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
	inspection_result VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE traceability_logs (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	inspection_id INT,
	log_details TEXT,
	log_date TIMESTAMP,
	location_details VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Products (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    supplier TEXT,
    origin TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE QualityTests (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    test_name TEXT,
    test_result BOOLEAN,
    test_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TraceabilityLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    event_type TEXT,
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
